scope.name: Challenges Tab
scope.description: AI-generated challenges with response submission and feedback system
features: Three challenge types: Journal Prompts, Product Case Questions, Business Ideas
User response submission with textarea input
AI feedback system (judgment, summary, or streamlining)
Copy-to-clipboard functionality for challenges and feedback
White text theming for better visibility

data_flow.step1: User selects challenge type and clicks generate
data_flow.step5: AI processes response and returns feedback

constraints: No persistent storage - challenges and responses are ephemeral
Webhook integration required for real functionality
Must maintain consistent theming with other tabs
All text must be white for visibility
